short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take a break from the naitonal news and start a Omaha news diet!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you from Omaha? Do you feel overwhelmed by the national news? Well, you're in luck!

Omaha News Diet is a simple Chrome Extension that helps you block out all that noise coming from the national news and lets you focus exclusively on news coming out of the great city of Omaha.

Omaha News Diet is simple to use. Just click the icon in the top bar and press the “Start Diet” button. That’s it! All national news site will be blocked until you decide to stop. If we missed any websites, you can add new websites manually through the “Manage Blacklist” button.

Take a break from the national news and start your Omaha New Diet today!

Testimonials:
No comment - Rep. Don Bacon
"This extension really changed my life" - Autonomous
